feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar punctuation styles with the use of hyphens, brackets, quotation marks, and commas.

feature2.explanation: Both texts showcase a formal and concise lexical and grammatical style with well-structured sentences.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are coherent and display a similar level of complexity and arrangement.

feature4.explanation: Both texts convey a serious and informative tone regarding the subject matter, lacking informal expressions or idioms.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were detected in either text, indicating a consistent level of attention to detail.

overall.explanation: Considering the alignment of punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
